name: Avoid having unused variables (PHP)
description:
This rule searches for all the Sections with too many unused variables.
A violation is detected when a local variable is declared and/or assigned, but not used
output:
This report lists all the Sections with too many unused variables.

This QR provides the following information:
Sections  full name.
rationale:
Unused variables make the code more complex to read and are redundant.
The violation is reported even only one unused variable is found
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of unused variables.
